source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, scenic shot of a misty beach. Large rock formations are visible along the coastline and in the water, with gentle waves lapping at the shore. A few small figures can be seen walking in the distance.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a static, scenic shot of a misty beach. Large rock formations are visible along the coastline and in the water, with gentle waves lapping at the shore. A few small figures can be seen walking in the distance.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several seagulls are flying overhead, which is not depicted in the video.
